Articles.Content:
Other than planetfactory, are there any planet addition/editing mods out there?

I'd like to add in a planet or two beyond jool, just regular stuff nothing super fancy.

I have tried looking for this too, unfortunately I think planet factory is the basis "code" perhaps (I'm not really versed in such things) that allows other modders to actually add extra planets.

Perhaps you could try getting to grips with the way planet factory CE works, then you could go crazy and start adding any system in any orbit you would prefer? I know it has a GUI where you can do these edits. I cannot help unfortunately but perhaps reading up on it or watching a few videos might help.
Well, the thing is I'd like to create a planet just beyond jool/eeloo without sentar in the system ...

Well, the thing is I'd like to create a planet just beyond jool/eeloo without sentar in the system ...

You can disable it while the game is loading.
